keyword: calories in a chocolate chip cookie from subway
title: Calories in a Subway Chocolate Chip Cookie
meta_description: Discover calories in a chocolate chip cookie from Subway, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for better choices.
h1: Calories in a Subway Chocolate Chip Cookie
assumptions: Standard Subway chocolate chip cookie (about 45g), baked fresh in-store, no customizations or add-ons.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and exact recipe changes; Subway values may update. Check app or store for latest.

quick_answer.text: A Subway chocolate chip cookie contains about 220 kcal, with 30g carbs and 10g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Choose Subway's oatmeal raisin cookie instead

faqs.q: How many calories in a chocolate chip cookie from Subway?
What are the carbs in a Subway chocolate chip cookie?
faqs.a: About 30g total carbs, including 20g sugars and 1g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a Subway cookie high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 10g total fat per cookie, with 5g saturated.

faqs.q: How much protein in Subway's chocolate chip cookie?
Do Subway cookies have trans fats?
faqs.a: Typically 0g trans fat, but check for updates as recipes change.
